title: Heir to the lip kit billions! Kylie Jenner's girl Stormi tests out her mommy's gloss
text:
Kylie Jenner launched her lip kit line to massive success just a few years ago.

Now her daughter Stormi is getting in on the family business.

The one-year-old was wearing her 22-year-old mother's latest lip kit collection all over her face as she helped test out the new shades on Monday.

Her little helper! Kylie Jenner was wearing her mother Kylie's latest lip kit collection all over her face as she helped test out the new shades on Monday

Kylie took to her Instagram stories to share a video of the tot adorably applying the lip gloss all over her mouth.

'Stormi is testing out Charm for you guys,' Kylie said.

The youngster then began applying the lip gloss onto her mother's own mouth, but was a little overenthusiastic in the application.

'Mouth,' the child appeared to say.

She's still learning: The tot was wearing the new shade all over her face

Smile! Kylie's child showed off the new Charm shade for fans

The results: Stormi then adorably opened her mouth wide for the camera, showing off the messy results of the application

'Only on my lip!' Kylie playfully chided the child.

Stormi then adorably opened her mouth wide for the camera, showing off the messy results of the application.

'Okay girl we've got to take that off, we got to take it off,' Kylie said just before the tot began walking away.

'Storm! Oh my goodness. She really is my daughter,' she mused.

'She really is my daughter': Jenner mused at their similarities

Coming soon: Jenner's newest lip kit collection will be available at Ulta Beauty on October 13

'Our main focus right now is Stormi!': Jenner and her ex Travis Scott have remained committed co-parents

Fans can get their hands on Kylie's newest makeup collection exclusively at Ulta Beauty on October 13.

Meanwhile, Kylie is back on the market after her recent split from Travis Scott, who she shares daughter Stormi with.

The youngster has remained the couple's top priority.

'Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! our friendship and our daughter is priority,' she tweeted.
description: The one-year-old was wearing her 22-year-old mother's latest lip kit collection all over her face as she helped test out the new shades. 'Stormi is testing out Charm for you guys,' Kylie said.
